fields.name: Thermal weapon
fields.description:
Enhances thermal weapon systems.
• Increases thermal damage (up to +25%)

fields.name: Ballistic weapon
fields.description:
Optimizes ballistic weapon handling.
• Increases ballistic accuracy (up to +10%)
• Increases ballistic damage (up to +25%)

fields.name: Missile weapon
fields.description:
Improves missile weapon systems.
• Increases missile accuracy (up to +20%)
• Increases missile damage (up to +25%)

fields.name: Electronic warfare
fields.description:
Enhances electronic warfare capabilities.
• Increases debuff success chance (up to +30%)
• Increases debuff duration (up to +20%)

fields.name: Evasive maneuver
fields.description:
Improves ship maneuverability.
• Increases evasion chance (up to +20%)

fields.name: Counter electronic warfare
fields.description:
Improves resistance to electronic attacks.
• Increases resistance to debuffs (up to +30%)
• Reduces debuff duration (up to -20%)

fields.name: repair
fields.description:
Improves onboard repair systems.
• Increases repair efficiency (up to +30%)
• Reduces repair duration (up to -30%)

fields.name: Shield enhancement
fields.description:
Enhances shield systems.
• Improves shield damage absorption (up to +20%)

fields.name: Hide signature
fields.description:
Reduces ship signature.
• Improves stealth and invisibility effectiveness

fields.name: Detection
fields.description:
Improves detection and scanning systems.
• Improves scan efficiency (up to +30%)
• Reduces accuracy penalties against unscanned targets

fields.name: Sharpshooting
fields.description:
Improves weapon accuracy.
• Increases overall weapon precision (up to +10%)
